content: Oct 6 Shares of Coupa Software Inc  a U.S. maker of cloud-based software that helps companies manage spending  surged 85 percent in their debut on Thursday  as investors showed renewed appetite for IPOs by venture-backed tech companies.
name: Nutanix Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Coupa Software shares soar 85 pct in market debut

content: Oct 6 Shares of Coupa Software Inc  a U.S. maker of cloud-based software that helps companies manage spending  more than doubled in their debut on Thursday  underscoring strong market appetite for IPOs by tech companies - even unprofitable ones.
name: Nutanix Inc
title: Coupa Software shares more than double in market debut
